title: 1926 Akron Indians season
text: The <a href="1926%20NFL%20season">1926</a> <a href="Akron%20Indians">Akron Indians</a> season was their seventh and final season in the <a href="National%20Football%20League">league</a> and only season as the Indians. The team failed to improve on their <a href="1925%20Akron%20Pros%20season">previous output</a> of 4–2–2, winning only one game. They tied for sixteenth in the league.
